Text: Correct, I did make this in vb.net as it is rather quick at creating guis.

@matty95 I was going to ask if you know of a linux client but I found out you made this in vb.net(so I should be able to just emulate this in wine), can I ask what version of .net you used to make this?

Nice job Matty!...2 things I would of did different, 
1. you should convert the size in the datagrid into something a little more readable(Mb or Kb maybe).
2. I think you can use parallelism to feed that grid(it would significantly reduce the time it takes to load(at least for me w/6 core)) don't quote me on that though it's worth looking into. Still thank you very much.
p.s. this is a clean program :)
There's an easier, and frankly safer way. see here: https://forum.utorrent.com/viewtopic.php?pid=646672
